alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:28PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grand County through 500 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Moab, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Grand County, including the following locations... Arches National Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 200 and 206. Utah 128 between mile markers 19 and 30, and near mile marker 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
